channel.title: Just bought a VPS from SoftSysHosting.. How do i use it?
channel.description:
I just bought a VPS from softsyshosting.com/ and it has given me no information what-so-ever about the VPS. It has given me a receipt from the purchase, but no IP address, no information of the VPS, or any instructions on how to connect to it.
Can someone please help me out? I really just want to get on my VPS to start running my server.
**FIGURED IT OUT AFTER POSTING THIS, LOL**
